answer: The methods used in this study can inform future research on the X-ray luminosity of starburst galaxies by analyzing the contribution of OB star populations to the total X-ray emission, as seen in astro-ph/0103484.
explanation: This paper presents an empirical analysis of the integrated X-ray luminosity arising from populations of OB stars, which is relevant to understanding the X-ray luminosity of starburst galaxies.
evidence_quote: X-ray luminosity of OB star populations
